var self = cmdarg();
var float_0 = self.getNode("sim/multiplay/generic/float[0]", 1); var float_1 = self.getNode("sim/multiplay/generic/float[1]", 1); var float_3 = self.getNode("sim/multiplay/generic/float[3]", 1);
